Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the incident by stating that the 7-year-old was decapitated, which is not supported by any evidence.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the media covered up the incident.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the perpetrator of the attack was a Somalian migrant, without any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation to the claim that the media covered up the incident, as the incident was widely covered by various news outlets.
